ygData.msgSnippet: It would be nice if one could have multiple instances of the same Extractor class in their processing chain.  In the case of configuration-heavy extractors one

Subject: Multiple Extractor instances of same class
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=39397245; y=KWF2HURFXTQjc1g2MP5M8hbmulry2Sd35ef_gmHqhRGD6PTOfQ

It would be nice if one could have multiple instances of the same
Extractor class in their processing chain.  In the case of
configuration-heavy extractors one may want two differently configured
but same class extractors.  Maybe Processor.options should key on the
name instead of the class or something...

eric
